title: Graphic Designer
description: Create visual concepts, design layouts, and produce graphics for various projects.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design user interfaces and user experiences for web and mobile applications.

title: Logo Designer
description: Specialize in crafting unique and memorable logos for brands and businesses.

title: Illustrator
description: Create hand-drawn or digital illustrations for various artistic and commercial projects.

title: Print Production Artist
description: Prepare digital files for print, ensure quality, and assist with print production.

title: Packaging Designer
description: Design packaging materials and labels for products, considering branding and aesthetics.
